title: Copy the Qualification Template
text: Qualification template R script provides typical workflow qualification model. details available documentation OSPSuite Reporting Engine package üîó

title: Copy the Qualification Template
text: function copyQualificationTemplate() copies RScript qualification-template-workflow.R current working directory (see getwd() setwd()) illustrated tutorial video . Users can modify template fit needs. Video

title: Simulation Tree
text: function runSimulationTree() starts shiny app RStudio dialog window allows users browse simulation tree pkml simulation file, select desired branches/leafs copied, illustrated video . Video shiny app includes search bar highlight branches/leafs include defined keywords. However, using search bar may slow interactivity app. shiny app based function ospsuite::getSimulationTree() returns tree like structured list allowing intuitive navigation simulation tree.

title: Tables of Units and PK Parameters
text: function tableOfUnits() displays datatable (see {DT} package) dimensions units available OSPSuite. RStudio users can also access table using Addin illustrated video . Video üõà Note OSPSuite.Addins also provides unit converter addin, whose dedicated article available üîó

title: Tables of Units and PK Parameters
text: function tableOfPKParameters() displays datatable (see {DT} package) PK Parameters available OSPSuite. RStudio users can also access table using Addin illustrated video . Video

title: Unit Converter
text: function unitConverter() starts shiny app RStudio Viewer pane allows users convert units dimension illustrated video . Video

title: Unit Converter
text: far, following dimensions can bridged Molecular Weight: Amount Mass Concentration (mass) Concentration (molar) AUC (mass) AUC (molar) selecting one dimensions, users notified app conversion bridged dimension supported. Molecular Weight Unit defined user taken account converting bridged dimension.

title: Unit Converter
text: Fraction dimension, unit named Unitless defined enum ospUnits corresponds fraction . users need convert fractions, currently provide unit "" instead "Unitless".

title: insertOSPSuiteTemplate ‚Äî insertOSPSuiteTemplate
text: Insert template code current document aiming providing starting point users interact {ospsuite} package. code include following steps: loads simulation update simulation parameter add output paths simulation run simulation format simulation results save simulation results run PK analysis format PK analysis results save PK analysis results
